title: Entrepreneur/freelancer
description: Self employed as a freelance musician, teacher, and video producer. I started in 2015 with freelancing and teaching, and in 2020 I branched out by adding video production. Since starting my freelance work I have played between 10-20 concerts a year, mainly in Stockholm, but also around Södermanland, and in Arvika. In 2018 I rented an office for teaching near Vanadisplan, and soon after I was hired to head the guitar education at Musikskolan Lilla Akademiens voluntary instrument education on saturdays - Lilla Musica and Lilla Corda. I began producing videos during the covid19 pandemic, mainly because my students weren't able to play concerts. Since then I've been producing videos for other musicians.

title: Guitar and ensemble teacher
description: Teacher in guitar and guitar orchestra. Since 2022 I've been producing the Stora Gitarrorkesterdagen, which is a project where several schools from the greater Stockholm metropolitan area meet once a year to rehearse and perform together. The first year five schools and around 45 guitarists participated.

title: Guitar and ensemble teacher
description: Teacher in guitar and ensemble at Musikskolan Lilla Akademiens elementary school, upper secondary school, and pre-college.

title: Guitar and ensemble teacher
description: Teacher in guitar and ensemble at Arte della Musicas (Musikskolan Lilla Akademins voluntary education) Lilla Musica, for children age 10-15, and Lilla Corda, for children age 6-9.

title: Store employee
description: Store employee for a recruitment agency. The work mainly consisted of stocking shelves at ICA. After a couple of months I was tasked with leading shifts when the actual shift leader was absent.
